title: UI/UX Designer
job_overview:
We're looking for a detail-oriented UI/UX Designer to join our team. If you're passionate about crafting visually appealing design systems and have expertise in UI/UX Design, Mobile, and Web Design, we want to hear from you!

Responsibilities:
-Develop product design processes and oversee feature creation.
-Expand and maintain our design system, ensuring successful -implementation with engineering teams.
-Tailor designs to specific customer needs in the hosting field.
-Lead UX research, user testing, and journey mapping processes.
-Create creative assets supporting our product activities.

Requirements:
-Proven experience as a Product Designer with a strong portfolio.
-Understanding of user-centered design principles.
-Excellent communication skills.
-Proficiency in Figma.

Payments $5/hr
